participant_1.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.

participant_2.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.
